titles.title: Honoring the service and accomplishments of Major General Joseph G. Webb, Jr., United States Army.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 11/15/2006--Introduced. Honors Major General Joseph Webb, Jr., for more than 39 years of military service on the occasion of his retirement from the Army on December 31, 2006. Commends him for his dedication and commitment to excellence in the field of medicine and medical research. Recognizes him, as a soldier, clinician, and commander, for displaying throughout his career the highest levels of leadership, competence, integrity, and moral courage.
